event.name: START_BEACON_AEA_OLD_3
event.text: You've arrived near the Lylmik Gate.

event.name: AEA_OLD_3_EXIT

beaconType.unvisitedTooltip: This is the location of the Council Administration Building.
beaconType.visitedTooltip: This is the location of the Council Administration Building.

event.text: You've arrived near the gate out of the exit.

event.name: STORE_HOSTILE_AEA_OLD_FINAL
event.text: A greedy Lylmik merchant has setup here in advance of the fleet. They don't care who they're selling to, just that they're selling.
The merchant was ready for this and activates their weapons in turn.

event.name: AEA_OLD_SHOWDOWN_AUTO
event.text: It appears this ship is also equipped with an advanced AI system. Now that the crew is dead, it has taken control! You sense oxygen levels dropping on the Flagship as well...

event.name: AEA_OLD_SHOWDOWN_CASUAL
event.text: You arrive at the beacon to discover a massive vessel blocking your path. Your sponsor appears concerned, although its hard to tell with Lylmiks. "This shouldn't be here, I'll try to reach out to them." It doesn't take you long to realize they aren't here for a chat.
You didn't come this far to give up now. There's nothing left to do but destroy this ship if you want to escape. You lylmik sponsor has clearly given up on trying to get them to stand down.

event.name: AEA_OLD_SHOWDOWN_WIN_ONE
event.text:
One wing of the flagship explodes in a fiery explosion, ripping it from the hull. The flagship powers up it's jump drive and jumps away, it looks like they're attempting to make some emergency repairs.
You collect the scrap and components left from the explosion and make some emergency repairs yourself.

event.name: AEA_OLD_SHOWDOWN_WIN_TWO
event.text:
A second wing of the flagship is ripped from the hull. The flagship again powers up it's jump drive and jumps away.
You collect the scrap and components left from the explosion and make some emergency repairs yourself.

event.name: AEA_OLD_SHOWDOWN_WIN_THREE
event.text:
Finally the flagship explodes, with the flagship destroyed you'll finally be able to destroy the gate.
You collect the scrap and components left from the explosion and make some emergency repairs.

event.name: AEA_OLD_SHOWDOWN_WIN
event.text: You watch in triumphant jubilation as the Flagship explodes. You've won this battle!.

event.name: AEA_OLD_VICTORY

beaconType.unvisitedTooltip: This is the location of a large structure.
beaconType.visitedTooltip: This is the location of a large structure.

event.text: You've finally made it to the gate, you need to destroy it to prevent the lylmiks being released into your last universe.

You fire one last barrage at the outer structure of the gate and a series of exposions cascade across the circumference. The wormhole at the center of the gate had almost opened but as you watch it starts to fold in on itself and shrink.

choice.text: You feel a pull towards the collapsing wormhole, you have a few moments before you'll be pulled in.

event.name: AEA_OLD_VICTORY_SPEAK
event.text: YOU SHOULD NOT BE SEEING THIS, IF YOU ARE CHECK TO MAKE SURE YOUR HYPERSPACE IS UP TO DATE. To continue type: "EVENT AEA_OLD_VICTORY_WIN" into your console.
Unfortunately the gate is protected by a massive energy shield, your sensors indicate that it's power source is somewhere else.

event.name: AEA_OLD_VICTORY_CREW
event.text: You look around at your crew, who are standing, waiting for you.

event.name: AEA_OLD_VICTORY_
event.text: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS

win.text: You've saved this universe from certain enslavement.

event.name: AEA_OLD_ENDING_START
event.text: You've arrived in Node 17 just in time, the Rebel flagship is damaged but also close to being able to take over the federation base.

finalBoss.text: This is not the victory you hoped for, but it's one nonetheless.

win.text: Your victory over the dreadnaught was overshadowed by your escape from the Lylmiks
